name: PeppaPigQuiz
0:
”Alexa, open Peppa Pig Quiz”
”Alexa, start Peppa Pig Quiz”
”Alexa, play Peppa Pig Quiz”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: peppa pig quiz
des:
Are you a big fan of Peppa Pig?
Play this fun daily quiz about Peppa Pig and her friends.

****** NEW ******
Premium products now available for purchase:
• Unlimited games pack - one time purchase
Lets you play as many games each day as you want. Without the pack there's a one game per day limit.

• Question pack 1 - one time purchase
If you've been through all the free questions, you can add 50 new questions to the quiz.
******

I'll ask you five multiple choice questions.
If you think the answer to a question is option two, then wake Alexa and say "two".
When you answer you must say "Alexa" first, otherwise I won't hear you !

**** Commands to use when playing ****
• "I don't know"/"Next"/"Skip" - If you don't know the answer, some of the questions are quite tricky!
• "Repeat" - If you want to hear the question again.

We hope you enjoy playing the quiz as much as we enjoyed making it.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
